landingPage.resumeText: Fascinated by the field of computer science and its security challenges, I am pursuing a career in cybersecurity. Creative and persistent, I enjoy tackling challenges as a team to address current issues in information security.

forensique.title: Forensics
forensique.contentText: Solid understanding of basic principles of digital forensics, including data acquisition methods, data analysis, and presentation of evidence.

devsecops.title: DevSecOps
devsecops.contentText: Strong understanding of development, cybersecurity, and regulatory compliance. Proficient in CI/CD, network security, and penetration testing.

pentesting.title: Penetration Testing
pentesting.contentText: Testing for common vulnerabilities and intrusions. Reconnaissance, exploitation, post-exploitation, and reporting. Identifying and fixing vulnerabilities to ensure the security of systems and networks.

developpement.title: Development
developpement.contentText: Expertise in Java, Python, C++, JavaScript, Bash, Docker, and more. Advanced use of GitHub for version control and collaboration on personal and professional projects.

aboutMePage.title: WHO AM I
aboutMePage.paragraph_one: Cyberdefense cybersecurity engineer, specializing in CSIRT. Passionate about data protection and cybersecurity, I have expertise in establishing robust security systems for various companies. Skills include penetration testing, regulatory compliance, and incident management. üõ°Ô∏è
aboutMePage.paragraph_two: As a dedicated self-host, I believe in the necessity of controlling one's own data. Specialized in hosting websites, applications, and services, I share my knowledge to encourage digital autonomy. üåê
aboutMePage.paragraph_three: My goal: Provide advanced security solutions while facilitating access to technological autonomy for all. Let's secure and empower together! üöÄ
